caption.p: The biogenic properties of AF-AgNPs. The physical properties of the biosynthesized nanoparticles were assessed by UV-2450 Shimadzu spectrophotometer- Energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX) analysis and SEM. ( A) UV visible spectra of Ag nanoparticles, ( B) SEM results at 15 Kv, ( C) percentage intensity of particle size distribution of biosynthesized AF-NPs. UV, ultraviolet; PdI, polydispersity index.
